resources:
SRA
Hello blank fragment Home The Society of Robotics and Automation is a society for VJTI students under the Department of Mechanical Engineering. The society conducts workshops like Wall-E (Self Balancing and Line Following Robot) and MARIO (Robotic Manipulator controlled using ROS) to teach the basics of robotics to first year students. Contact Us> E-mail:
